qas.question: When was the article published about the case?
What did he think that the poor construction led to?

context: In <a1_0>January 2010<a1_0/>, Hong Kong-based English newspaper The Standard reported that writer Tan Zuoren attempted to document shoddy construction that may have led to <a2_0>massive casualties<a2_0/> in schools, was sentenced to in prison ostensibly for his writing an article <a0_0>in 2007<a0_0/> in support of the pro-democracy movement in 1989.
